titleStmt.title: A true history of the several honourable families of the right honourable name of Scot in the shires of Roxburgh and Selkirk, and others adjacent. Gathered out of ancient chronicles, histories, and traditions of our fathers. By Captain Walter Scot, an old souldier, and no scholler, and one that can write nane, but just the letters of his name.
titleStmt.author: Scot, Walter, ca. 1614-ca. 1694.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson, printer to His most Sacred Majesty, city and colledge,

notesStmt.note: "Satches' postral, humbly presented to his noble and vvorthy friends of the names of Scot & Elliot, and others. Part second," has separate dated title page and pagination; register is continuous.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
